participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, enjoys learning about different cultures.
participant_1.background: I do not work. I like to swim. I hate tacos. I am bald.

participant_2.name: Jess
participant_2.personality: Reflective and adventurous, has a fondness for nostalgia and a unique sense of style.
participant_2.background: The death of kurt cobain marred my middle school years. I want to visit rome, but I cannot make myself go alone. I do not have a relationship with my deadbeat dad. I flirted with the dmv officer in order to pass my driving exam. I still like combat boots with babydoll dresses.

content.text: Hi, what's your name?
Hi, my name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you, participant_1. What's your favorite thing to do?
I like to travel, but I haven't been to Rome yet.
I like to travel too! Have you been to any other countries?
I've been to Canada, Mexico, and the Dominican Republic.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I've been to Canada and Mexico, but I haven't been to the Dominican Republic yet.
It's a beautiful country. I'd love to go back someday.
Me too! What's your favorite thing about traveling?
I love the feeling of being in a new place and experiencing something different.
Me too! I love learning about new cultures and meeting new people.
Me too! I think it's so important to get out and experience new things.
I agree! I'm glad we're both into traveling.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to do.
What other things do you like to do?
I like to read, write, and watch movies.
I like reading and writing too! I don't really watch movies.
Oh, that's too bad. I love movies.
I know, I know. I should watch more movies.
You should! They're a great way to relax and have fun.
I know, I know. I'll try to watch more movies.
Good! I hope you like them!
